game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a powerful artifact is buried within an abandoned ruin. Your quest is to find it and bring it back to the village elder.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must explore the dense forest to find the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins.
task.location: The Heart of the Emerald Jungle

task.description: Beware of deadly traps and riddles as you navigate through the ruins.
The artifact is said to be in the innermost chamber of the ruins. Retrieve it and return unharmed.
